message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $13,500. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe it's a good price for both of us, considering the market value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,750? This reflects its worth while acknowledging your initial offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet at this price.
